dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 516 IH: Middle Class Payroll Tax Relief Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Maffei introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To extend the payroll tax reduction.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Middle Class Payroll Tax Relief Act.

subsection.text: Subsection (c) of section 601 of the Tax Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010 (26 U.S.C. 1401 note) is amended by striking and 2012 and inserting , 2012, and 2013.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to remuneration received, and taxable years beginning, after December 31, 2012.
